class tau.controller.ByName[source]¶

Bases: object

Mixin for a model with a unique ‘name’ field

classmethod withName(name)[source]¶
class tau.controller.Controller(fields)[source]¶

Bases: object

The C” in MVC

Subclasses reside in the ‘model’ package and define a member dictionary ‘attributes’ that describes the data model in the form:

<attribute>: {
property: value, [[property: value], ...]

}

The ‘model’ package initializes the set ‘references’ in each class to describe one-sided relationships, e.g.

Model_A:
attr_x: { ‘model’: ‘Model_C’ }
Model_B:
attr_y: { ‘model’: ‘Model_C’ }
Model_C:
references = set( (Model_A, ‘attr_x’), (Model_B, ‘attr_y’) )

The ‘model’ package also initializes the dictionary ‘associations’ in each class to describe two-sided relationships, e.g.

Model_A:
attr_x: {
model: Model_B via: attr_k

} associations = {attr_x: (Model_B, attr_k)}

Model_B:
attr_k: {
model: Model_A

} associations = {attr_k: (Model_A, attr_x)}

classmethod all()[source]¶

Return a list of all records

classmethod create(fields)[source]¶

Store a new model record and update associations

classmethod delete(keys=None, eids=None)[source]¶

Delete the records that match the given keys and update associations

classmethod exists(keys=None, eids=None)[source]¶

Return true if a record matching the given keys exists

get(key, default=None)[source]¶
classmethod match(field, regex=None, test=None)[source]¶

Return a list of records with ‘field’ matching ‘regex’ or ‘test’

onCreate()[source]¶
onDelete()[source]¶
onUpdate()[source]¶
classmethod one(keys=None, eid=None)[source]¶

Return a single record matching all of ‘keys’ or element id ‘eid’

Transltes model id numbers in self to model controllers and returns all data as a dictionary

Return a list of records matching all of ‘keys’ or element id ‘eid’
